Based on other reports from people whose accounts were hacked the redemptions that take place are last minute bookings usually for premium cabin flights. The reasoning for that is that it gives less time for the legitimate account holder to notice the missing miles and have those reservations cancelled. On my account rather than booking premium award flights someone made several hotel bookings presumably last minute for Valentine’s Day.
